title: About Me
---

I am originally from San Jose, Costa Rica but I have lived a traveled life. 
I've lived in Costa Rica, Arizona, and Oregon all for a different amount of time. 
Costa Rica 16 years, Arizona was my home for 4 years, and Oregon for 10 years (and counting). 

Throughout all my years, I've always loved watching sports and reading. 
I will watch just about every sport possible, as boring as some people may consider them to be. 
My favorite teams, by major sports, are: 

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column}
- Soccer: Real Madrid
- American Football: Green Bay Packers
::: 

::: {.column}
- Basketball: Philadelphia 76ers
- Baseball: New York Yankees
::: 

::::

Other than that, I have loved traveling, enjoying different cultures and enjoying every opportunity I come across. 
I look forward to more to come!

<script>
let slideIndex = 0;
autoShowSlides();

function autoShowSlides() {
  let i;
  let slides = document.getElementsByClassName("mySlides");
  for (i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) {
    slides[i].style.display = "none";
  }
  slideIndex++;
  if (slideIndex > slides.length) { slideIndex = 1 }
  slides[slideIndex-1].style.display = "block";
  setTimeout(autoShowSlides, 3000); // Change image every 3s
}
</script>
